Piety and Philosophy

A devout ruler who tried to appease the Ulema and ruled according to Sharia; imposed Jizya on non-Muslims.

Welfare Ruler
ЁЯПЫя╕П
Culture and Patronage

Known for his public works, he built several canals, hospitals (Dar-ul-Shifa), and cities (Hisar, Firozabad, Jaunpur). He also established Diwan-e-Khairat for the poor and Diwan-e-Bandgan for slaves.

ЁЯУЬ
Rule and Administration

He made the Iqta system hereditary, which weakened the army.
